name: Down The Rabbit Hole (kanadez0s)
description:
Down the Rabbit Hole is an action game where you go down rabbit holes and shoot your way through rabbits. 

Directions: 

  • WASD keys or arrow keys to move around. 
  • Mouse to look around. 
  • Left mouse key to shoot. 

Upcoming features:

  • Score point system. 
  • Easter egg when going down specific hole sequence. (Now it's infinite loop)
